generated_caption: In 2019 , exports of merchandise from Czechia to Russia amounted to approximately 4.3 billion U.S. dollars . This was an increase in comparison with the previous year .
This statistic shows the share of households with access to fixed broadband of 30 Mbit/s in Sweden from 2017 to 2019 . In 2019 , around 98 percent of Swedish households had access to such speeds .

In 2020 , Guangdong had the largest urban population in China with over 87 million people living in cities . The rural population of Guangdong was around 32 million . In total , there were more than 695 million people living in urban areas across China that year .

As of January 2022 , 11 percent of respondents in the United States had a very favorable opinion of NFL player Odell Beckham Jr . Another 17 percent had a somewhat favorable view of him . In contrast , six percent of respondents had a very unfavorable opinion of him .

As of November 2020 , around one third of adults in the United Kingdom were fairly worried that a coronavirus vaccine would not be safe . However , 35 percent of respondents were not very worried about this possibility .

As of February 25 , 2022 , there were 1,074 patients hospitalized with coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in the United Kingdom . This statistic shows the number of patients hospitalized with coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in the United Kingdom from January 1 to February 25 , 2022 .

As of February 27 , 2022 , there were 10,453 patients in hospital with coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) . This statistic shows the number of patients in hospital with coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from January 1 to February 27 , 2022 .

The annual revenue of ESB Group , Ireland 's state-owned electricity and gas utility , increased to 3.76 billion euros in 2020 . This was an increase from the previous year 's revenue of 3.71 billion euros .

In 2019-2020 , most counterfeit cosmetics were sold offline in Russia . According to the survey of consumers , 69 percent of respondents purchased fake beauty products in physical stores . Only one third of respondents bought such items online .

In 2019 and 2020 , the most popular counterfeit cosmetic products among customers in Russia were mascaras . According to the survey , 75 percent of respondents purchased fake mascaras from online stores .
This statistic shows the annual sales volume of whiting in Spain from 2008 to 2020 . In 2020 , the sales volume of whiting amounted to approximately 41 thousand kilograms .

This statistic shows the share of U.S. adults with anxiety symptoms in 2019 , by ethnicity and severity . In 2019 , around 14.5 percent of Hispanic adults had any severity of anxiety symptoms . Anxiety is a mental health condition that can cause feelings of worry , nervousness or fear about everyday situations .

In 2020 , many Germans planned to give fewer tickets or coupons for cultural events as Christmas presents because of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic . However , most respondents stated that they would spend more money on Christmas gifts than in previous years .
In 2019 , domestic spending accounted for 38 percent of total tourist expenditure in Morocco . This share has been increasing over the last years .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak in Argentina caused a significant increase in sales of alcohol-based hand sanitizers . In the week ending March 8 , 2020 , the value of such products sold in the country reached over 27 million Argentine pesos , up from 6.4 million pesos recorded in the previous week .

As of October 2021 , the National Open Education Platform was the most popular platform for online courses in Russia . It accounted for 15.9 percent of all online courses published by Russian universities and colleges . The second most used platform was the State Educational Resource Center ( SEDOC ) , with 13.1 percent of all courses .

In 2021 , around 89,500 men and 87,300 women completed the Way of Saint James in Spain . This was an increase from the previous year , when the number of pilgrims decreased significantly due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic . The total number of pilgrims on the Camino de Santiago reached its highest value in 2019 , with over 346 thousand pilgrims .
According to a survey conducted in Russia in 2020 , rock was the most popular genre among male respondents . Pop songs were the most popular genre among female respondents .

This statistic presents the utility of features regarding online payment options in France as of January 2020 . It appears that 64 percent of respondents found the guarantee of secure payment very useful , while only three percent considered it not useful at all .

This statistic displays the distribution of depression symptom severity in the past two weeks among adults in the United States as of 2019 . During the survey , it was found that around 4 percent of respondents had severe depression symptoms .

In 2019 , around 16.8 percent of Hispanic adults in the United States had any severity of depression symptoms . This statistic illustrates the percentage of U.S. adults with depression symptoms in 2019 , by ethnicity and severity .

The province of Madrid was the most common area in which the first prize of the El Niño draw was won in Spain between 1908 and 2021 . The first prize was won there on 43 occasions , followed by Barcelona with 37 wins .

In 2019 , Latin America and the Caribbean imported some 370 million U.S. dollars worth of barley . This was an increase from the previous year , when imports were valued at around 300 million U.S. dollars .

As of the fourth quarter of 2021 , Roblox games had a daily active user base of over 13.7 million in Europe . The social gaming platform 's global daily active user base amounted to approximately 54.6 million .

As of February 2020 , Hungarians were most likely to expect that elderly people and risk groups will get vaccinated against coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) some time in spring . The share of respondents who expected that elderly people and risk groups would be vaccinated after spring decreased by one percentage point compared to January 2020 .

In 2020 , around 45 percent of Hungarian enterprises expected negative effects from the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic . The accommodation and hospitality sector was the most affected one with 63 percent of companies expecting negative consequences .

As of November 2020 , Amazon was the most popular online store among consumers in the United States . The online retailer was preferred by 58 percent of respondents . Walmart and Target were ranked second and third with 13 and eight percent of respondents , respectively .

The majority of Italians believe that this Christmas will be different from previous ones , and that it will be more spiritual . Moreover , 31 percent of respondents think that this year 's Christmas will be sadder than usual .

In November 2020 , 56 percent of Argentinians believed that abortion should be legal in any case because women have the right to decide . Meanwhile , 39 percent of respondents were against abortion legalization , considering that life begins at conception .

According to a survey conducted in December 2019 , most Russians planned to buy or order New Year 's gifts within few days before the holiday . Only 17 percent of respondents bought their presents a month ahead .

Foxford was the most popular online education platform in Moscow during the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic . In March 2020 , the number of search queries about this portal increased by over 1,250 percent compared to the same month in 2019 .

Nigeria 's real gross domestic product ( GDP ) grew by 4 percent in the third quarter of 2021 , compared to the previous year . This is a significant improvement from the previous quarter when Nigeria 's economy contracted by 3.5 percent . The growth in the third quarter of 2021 was driven by the oil and gas sector .
In the second quarter of 2021 , China was the main import trading partner of Nigeria with a share of 30 percent . India ranked second with an 8.2 percent share .

In 2020 , sustainability was considered to be one of the most important trends that will define the fashion industry in the coming years . According to a survey conducted among Romanian consumers , 53 percent of respondents agreed with this statement . In addition , 47 percent of respondents believed that using social media as a main marketing channel would also be an important trend for the future of the fashion industry .

As of October 2021 , around 27 percent of respondents in Italy expected their routine to return to normal by April-June 2021 . In January-March 2021 , only seven percent of respondents believed that their routine would already be back to normal .
The automotive industry generated approximately 25.5 billion euros in revenue in Romania in 2020 . This was a decrease of more than four billion euros compared to the previous year .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak had an impact on TV news viewers in Norway . The number of viewers of the Sunday evening news broadcasts increased by 20 percent compared to the same period last year .

According to a survey conducted in Poland in April 2021 , most respondents would like to see the opening of hotels and restaurants as the first step in lifting coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic restrictions . Only 12 percent of respondents stated that they do not know what should be lifted first .

In 2020 , imports of goods into Denmark amounted to approximately 624 billion Danish kroner . This was a decrease in comparison to the previous year when the value of imported goods reached its peak at over 650 billion Danish kroner .

According to a survey from April 2020 , most Romanians considered that the vaccine against COVID-19 will be efficient . More than 43 percent of respondents believed that the vaccine would be very or rather efficient . Only five percent of respondents stated that they did not know if the vaccine would be efficient .

According to a survey conducted in Romania in January 2021 , education and health were considered the most important priorities of the next Romanian Government . The coronavirus pandemic was also considered an important issue by almost one third of respondents .
In 2021 , the manufacturing sector employed over 32 million people in the European Union . This was followed by the wholesale and retail trade sector with nearly 27.4 million employees .

In 2020 , there were 331 deaths in Texas prisons from natural causes , illnesses , or other reasons . This was an increase from the previous year , when there were 179 such deaths . The number of deaths in Texas prisons from natural causes , illnesses , or other reasons has fluctuated over the past five years .

According to a survey conducted in Poland in April 2020 , over half of respondents did not want to be vaccinated against COVID-19 . The most common reason was that vaccines were unproven and dangerous .

The import volume of liquefied natural gas into India increased significantly over the years . In fiscal year 2020 , the country imported around 34 billion metric standard cubic meters of LNG . This was a significant increase from the previous year when the import volume stood at 28.7 billion metric standard cubic meters .

In 2019 , the Spanish public administration invested more than 780 million euros in biotechnology . This was followed by investments from own funds , which amounted to approximately 745 million euros .

The statistic shows the results of a survey , asking people in the United Kingdom ( UK ) how satisfied they were with their government 's response to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak . In April 2020 , 35 percent of respondents said they were fairly satisfied with the government 's approach to testing and tracing .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak had an impact on TV viewership in Norway . The TV show Nytt på nytt , which is broadcasted on Fridays , saw its audience increase by 20 percent during the first week of March compared to the same period last year . The TV show Alle mot 1 , which is broadcasted on Saturdays , also saw an increase in viewers , but not as much as Nytt på nytt .

The timeline shows the per capita consumption of bottled water in the United States from 1999 to 2020 . In 2020 , the U.S. per capita consumption of bottled water amounted to approximately 45 gallons .

This statistic depicts the per capita consumption of flavored milk and drinks in the United States from 2000 to 2019 . In 2019 , the per capita consumption of flavored milk and drinks in the United States was 13.84 pounds .
In 2020 , there were 45 nuclear power reactors in the United States that had been in operation for between 30 and 39 years . There were no reactors that had been in operation for less than one year .
This statistic shows the market share of operating systems for smartphones worldwide in 2013 , by country . In Italy , Android accounted for 63.4 percent of the smartphone operating system market .

In 2019 , China was the country with the highest installed capacity of wind power worldwide . The cumulative installed capacity of wind power in China amounted to approximately 234 gigawatts ( GW ) that year . The United States followed with an installed capacity of around 105.6 GW .

The timeline depicts the national TV advertising spending during NCAA Men 's Basketball Championship ( March Madness ) from 2015 to 2019 . In 2019 , the TV advertising spending during the NCAA Men 's Basketball Championship amounted to about 910 million U.S. dollars .
Trojans were the most common Windows malware type in 2019 , accounting for over 65 percent of all malware . This was followed by viruses at 15.7 percent and worms at eight percent .

In the fourth quarter of 2019 , Spotify 's churn rate was 4.8 million subscribers . This is a decrease from the previous quarter when the churn rate was at 5 million subscribers . Spotify is a music streaming service that allows users to stream songs and playlists on demand . The company has over 30 million active paying subscribers worldwide .

As of March 2021 , Facebook had a global penetration rate of 35.6 percent . This means that roughly one third of the world 's population used the social media platform at least once in the last month . The social network was most popular in North America , where it reached a penetration rate of 71.4 percent .

This statistic shows contemporary artworks with the highest auction price worldwide between July 2018 and June 2019 . During this period of time , Jeff Koons ' artwork 'Gazing Ball ( Balloon Dog ) ' sold for approximately 92.3 million U.S. dollars at Christie 's in New York .

The Consumer Confidence Index ( CCI ) in Poland decreased by 32.8 points in February 2022 compared to the previous month . This was the fourth consecutive decline in consumer confidence since September 2021 . The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic has had a significant impact on the Polish economy and consumer confidence .

This statistic presents the most popular social networks in the United States as of October 2018 , sorted by monthly active users . During the measured period , it was found that Facebook had 206 million monthly active users in the United States . Instagram ranked second with 157 million monthly active users .

In 2019 , California had the highest number of child abuse victims who saw court action taken . The state had over 26,700 such cases in that year . Texas and Ohio were the only other states to have more than 10,000 cases of child abuse victims seeing court action taken .

This statistic shows how children 's media consumption has changed during summer in the United States as of May 2015 . During the survey , 24 percent of respondents said that their children watched much more television during the summer than they did during the school year .
In 2019 , there were approximately 148 million internet users in Brazil . This number is expected to grow to around 187 million by 2026 .
This statistic shows the percentage of prison inmates who were abused as a child in 1999 . 37 percent of female inmates reported that they had been abused before admission to prison .
This statistic shows the selection criteria for smartphone purchase in China as of 2012 . During the survey , 43 percent of respondents said that they would buy a smartphone based on its brand .
This statistic shows the number of active internet-enabled smartphones in India from 2011 to 2016 . In 2014 , there were approximately 105 million active internet-enabled smartphones in India .

This statistic shows the number of intercountry adoptions involving the United States in 2018 , by visa type . In 2018 , there were 2,659 intercountry adoptions involving the United States with an IH-3 visa .

As of April 2020 , there were 497 million Tumblr blogs created since May 2011 . The social network is owned by the company of the same name , which was acquired by Yahoo in 2013 for 1.1 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the sales share of the sunglasses market in the United States in 2010 and 2011 , by retail channel . In 2011 , sunglass specialty stores accounted for 38.6 percent of all sunglasses sold in the U.S .

As of December 13 , 2020 , the number of deaths from COVID-19 in India took 296 days to double . In comparison , it took just 14 days for the death toll to double in Brazil . The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic has spread to many countries across the world , causing economies around the globe to suffer . For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic , please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page .

In 2020 , Marriott International 's net income amounted to a loss of around 148 million U.S. dollars . The company 's net income fluctuated over the years , reaching its peak in 2018 at 1.9 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic presents the weekly mobile e-mail access rate in selected countries as of 2016 . During the survey period , it was found that 67 percent of respondents from Sweden accessed their e-mail via mobile devices on a weekly basis .

As of February 2022 , TikTok was the most popular social media app in the United States . The short-form video sharing platform had an average monthly user engagement time of 25.8 hours per month . YouTube ranked second with an average monthly user engagement time of 22.4 hours .

This statistic shows the share of digital revenue in U.S. publishers ' total revenue in 2012 , by segment . In that year , business-to-business publishers had an average of 38 percent of their revenue coming from digital sources .
This statistic shows the market share of the three largest broadband providers in the United States from 2006 to 2013 . In 2007 , AT&T had a market share of 24 percent .

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in the main industrialized and emerging countries in 2021 . The GDP of the United States was estimated to be about 70,000 U.S. dollars per resident in 2021 .

This statistic presents the share of teenagers who owned a computer in the United States as of 2018 , by parent household income . During the survey period , it was found that 96 percent of teens whose parents had an annual household income of more than 75,000 U.S. dollars owned a computer .

This statistic presents app developers ' selected platforms used in Q1 2014 , broken down by region . During the survey period it was found that 75 percent of app developers from the Middle East and Africa were using Android to develop their apps .
The statistic shows the global inflation rate from 2016 to 2020 , with projections up until 2026 . In 2020 , the average inflation rate amounted to about 3.35 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the distribution of mobile app developers worldwide in 2014 , by region . During the survey period it was found that 33 percent of mobile app developers were located in Asia .

As of March 2020 , around half of the respondents in the United States expected to spend more on personal hygiene products such as hand sanitizer and hand soap because of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) .

This statistic presents information on the regular use of digital media devices in the United States as of April 2012 , sorted by device type . During the survey period , it was found that 83 percent of respondents used television regularly .

In 2021 , imports of trade goods from China increased by 16.5 percent compared to the previous year . This was an improvement from the previous year 's decline of 14.3 percent . The U.S.-China trade war has been a major factor in the volatility of this trade growth .

In August 2021 , the Global Purchasing Manager Index ( PMI ) of the industrial sector stood at 54.3 points . This means that the industrial sector 's performance improved compared to July 2021 . The Global PMI is a weighted average of PMIs from 26 countries and 17 industries .

This statistic shows the number of Starwood Hotels & Resorts properties worldwide from 2013 to 2015 , by region . In 2014 , there were 602 Starwood Hotels & Resorts properties in North America ( and Caribbean ) . Starwood Hotels & Resorts is one of the largest hotel chains worldwide .

This statistic shows the number of Starwood Hotels & Resorts properties worldwide in 2015 , by brand . In that year , Starwood Hotels & Resorts had 456 Sheraton-branded hotels and resorts operating around the world .
This statistic shows the income of Starwood Hotels & Resorts worldwide from 2010 to 2015 . In 2013 , the income of Starwood Hotels & Resorts amounted to about 634.7 million U.S. dollars .

The per capita consumption of fresh bananas in the United States has fluctuated over the past two decades . In 2020 , U.S. consumers ate an average of 27.3 pounds of bananas . This was a slight decrease from the previous year 's consumption of 27.5 pounds .

This statistic shows the economic value of meetings and exhibitions to host destinations in the United States in 2019 . In that year , meetings and exhibitions with an economic value of less than one million U.S. dollars generated approximately 43.7 percent of the total economic value of meetings and exhibitions to host destinations in the United States .

In 2020 , U.S. consumers consumed an average of 27.6 pounds of bananas per person . This statistic illustrates the per capita consumption of fresh fruit in the United States in 2020 , by selected fruit type .
This statistic shows the number of exhibitors at the largest exhibitions in the United States in 2019 . In that year , there were 33 exhibitions with fewer than 50 exhibitors .

The coronavirus outbreak in Poland caused an increase in the number of users and views on e-pharmacy websites . The most significant growth was recorded for Doz.pl , which saw its user base grow by 720 percent .
As of March 2021 , Blackview was the most popular brand on Facebook in Hong Kong with over 1.7 million fans . Bliss Travel ranked second with nearly 965 thousand fans .

This statistic shows the planned change in shows attended in the United States in 2014 , by type of show . During the survey , 26 percent of respondents said they planned to attend more regional shows in 2014 than in 2013 .

The per capita consumption of fresh sweet potatoes in the United States has increased over the past two decades . In 2020 , U.S. consumers ate an estimated 6.7 pounds of fresh sweet potatoes . This was a slight decrease from the previous year .

This statistic shows the per capita consumption of fresh lettuce ( romaine and leaf ) in the United States from 2000 to 2020 . According to the report , the U.S. per capita consumption of fresh lettuce amounted to approximately 14.3 pounds in 2020 .

The per capita consumption of fresh sweet corn in the United States has decreased over the past two decades . In 2020 , U.S. consumers ate an average of 4.6 pounds of fresh sweet corn . This was a decrease from the previous year 's consumption of 5.1 pounds .

This statistic shows the share of employees who feel it is acceptable to use social media for personal use at work by generation . During the survey , 36 percent of respondents aged between 19 and 30 years stated that they felt it was acceptable to use social media for personal use at work .

MGM Resorts International 's net income fluctuated significantly from 2008 to 2020 . In 2019 , the company reported a net income of 2.14 billion U.S. dollars . However , in 2020 , the net income decreased to minus 0.65 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the total assets of Wynn Resorts Limited worldwide from 2008 to 2020 . As of December 31 , 2020 , Wynn Resorts Limited had total assets amounting to approximately 13.87 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the leading trade show attendee promotion methods in the United States in 2013 . During the survey , 4.8 out of 10 respondents stated that e-mail from colleagues was an important source of information when deciding to attend a trade show or exhibition .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak has had a significant impact on the hotel industry in Spain . In March 2020 , hotel reservations for Easter holidays were cancelled at a rate of 40 percent across the country . The Canary Islands recorded the highest increase in cancellations with 128 percent .

The statistic shows the amount of venture capital investment in mobile and telecom in the United States in 2012 , by subsector . In the second quarter of 2012 , there were 5.1 billion U.S. dollars invested in mobile and telecom applications .

This statistic shows the percentage of Americans who have misconceptions about HIV transmission in 2012 . During the survey , 38 percent of respondents said they believed that swimming in a pool with someone who is HIV positive could transmit HIV .

This statistic shows the retail sales of telemark ski equipment in the United States from the 2008/09 season to the 2015/16 season . In the 2015/16 season , retail sales of telemark ski equipment amounted to approximately 2.1 million U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the number of custodial parents who received any child support in the United States from 1993 to 2011 . In 2011 , around 4,630 thousand custodial parents received some form of child support .
This statistic shows the number of single mothers who were awarded child support in the United States from 1993 to 2011 . In 2011 , around 6.5 thousand single mothers were awarded child support .

The statistic shows college sports telecasts with the highest TV rating in the 2012/13 academic year . The TV rating of the game between Alabama and Notre Dame was 15.2 , which was the highest TV rating for any college sports telecast that year .
Humira was the top-selling prescription drug in the United States in 2019 , with sales of over 21 billion U.S. dollars . Eliquis ranked second , with sales of nearly 10 billion U.S. dollars .

This graph depicts the area of trade shows in the United States from October 2010 to September 2013 , by month . In January 2013 , about 1.9 million net square feet of space were used for trade shows in the U.S.

In 2020 , Henkel invested in research and development ( R & D ) to the tune of 18 percent in its laundry and home care business . The adhesive technologies sector was the largest contributor to the company 's R & D expenditure with 58 percent .

This statistic shows the leading countries of non-oil merchandise imports to the United States in 2012 . In that year , China was the leading country for non-oil merchandise imports to the U.S. , accounting for 26 percent of all non-oil merchandise imports .

According to a survey of employees in the United States , 91 percent of respondents believed that gamification could increase productivity at work . Gamification is the use of game design elements in non-game contexts .

According to a survey conducted in March 2020 , 35 percent of female respondents in the United States believed that face masks were somewhat effective against COVID-19 . In comparison , only 33 percent of male respondents shared this opinion .
This statistic shows the share of jobs supported by imports to the U.S. in 2011 , by sector . In 2011 , about 348,000 jobs were supported by imports in the mining industry .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on controls taken against security risks related to cloud computing . 38 percent of respondents stated that they have implemented stronger oversight on contract management as a control to mitigate the new or increased risks related to the use of cloud computing .
This statistic shows Ubisoft 's quarterly market share in Europe from 2011 to 2014 . Ubisoft 's market share increased over this period of time , reaching 14 percent by the end of 2014 .

This statistic shows the percentage of teenagers in the United States who posted certain personal information on social networking sites as of May 2012 , broken down by gender . During the survey period , it was found that 95 percent of boys and 94 percent of girls had posted photos of themselves online .

This statistic shows IT security safeguard investments planned among organizations worldwide as of May 2017 . During the survey , 49 percent of the respondents stated that they planned to invest in improved collaboration among business , digital and IT functions .

This statistic shows the share of LGBT people who hid their sexual orientation when they were a kid in school in 2012 , by country . In Lithuania , 81 percent of LGBT respondents said that they had hidden their sexual orientation when they were a kid in school .
This statistic shows the breakdown of U.S. imports of goods in 2018 , by main commodity group . In that year , about 77.4 percent of all U.S. imports were manufactured goods .

This statistic shows Future PLC 's annual revenue in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2011 and 2012 , by sector . In 2012 , the company generated around 21.6 million British pounds from its entertainment sector .

In 2020 , Sallie Mae generated an interest income of approximately 21 million U.S. dollars from cash and equivalents . This was a significant decrease in comparison to the previous year when the company 's interest income amounted to over 73 million U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the likelihood of consumers to buy and wear Google Glasses as of May 2013 . During the survey , 28 percent of respondents stated that they would consider buying and wearing Google Glasses .

According to a survey conducted in March 2020 , around 46 percent of respondents aged 30 to 44 years old in the United States believed that hand sanitizers were very effective against COVID-19 . In comparison , only 37 percent of respondents aged 18 to 29 years old shared this opinion .

This statistic shows the amount of money French consumers are willing to pay for monthly YouTube premium content as of March 2013 . During the survey , 58 percent of respondents stated that they would not be willing to pay anything for YouTube premium content .

The global stocks-to-use ratio of cotton has increased over the past three decades . In 2019 , the stocks-to-use ratio stood at 60 percent . This means that the global stock of cotton was 60 percent of the total use of cotton in that year . The highest stocks-to-use ratio was recorded in 2014 when it reached 95 percent .

This statistic depicts the global production of cottonseed meal and oil from 2009/2010 to 2017/2018 . During this last mentioned period , some 15,69 million tons of cottonseed meal were produced worldwide .

This statistic presents information on U.S. YouTube users who regularly watch favorite YouTube channels as of February 2017 . During the survey period , it was found that 34 percent of respondents said they had many favorite YouTube channels that they watched regularly .

This statistic shows the gross output of U.S. aircraft manufacturing industry from 2008 to 2019 . In 2019 , the U.S. aircraft manufacturing industry had a gross output of approximately 133.4 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the average number of security breaches experienced by organizations in the United Kingdom ( UK ) within the last year as of early 2013 , by organization size . Large organizations experienced an average of 114 security breaches per year .

This statistic shows the results of a 2015 survey among American adults on the legal age to get tattoos without parental permission . 84 percent of respondents said they think someone should be allowed to get a tattoo without the consent of their parents at the age of 18 .
In December 2021 , Android accounted for 3.6 percent of the smartphone market in Japan . iOS was the second most popular operating system with a share of 2.5 percent .
This statistic shows the population change in Australia from 2010 to 2020 . In 2020 , Australia 's population increased by approximately 1.25 percent compared to the previous year .
This statistic shows the ethnic groups in Australia as of 2011 . In 2011 , 7.6 percent of the population in Australia had Irish ancestry .

According to a survey conducted in March 2020 , 33 percent of female respondents stated that they purchased more canned goods due to coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) . In comparison , only 27 percent of male respondents reported buying more canned goods .

This statistic shows the remaining life years of selected world commodity reserves as of 2012 . The remaining life year of the world 's iron ore reserves was estimated to be at around 34 years in 2012 .

In 2021 , Cui Ruzhuo was the most successful Chinese artist alive . His works sold for approximately 780 million yuan at public auctions that year . The second and third most successful artists were Zeng Tiantian and Zhang Chunya .

This statistic shows the results of a 2011 survey among adult Americans on whether they feel Martin Luther King Jr.'s birthday should be a national holiday or not . 74 percent of respondents said yes .
This statistic shows the value of the U.S. tableware market in 2012 , by category . In that year , the dinnerware segment had a value of approximately 1.9 billion U.S. dollars .

General Dynamics , a U.S.-based defense contractor , owned 10.2 million square feet of floor space in its facilities as of December 31 , 2020 . General Dynamics ' Aerospace sector owned the most floor space with over 6.7 million square feet .

This statistic shows vehicle buyers ' use of information sources worldwide in 2012 , by country . During the survey , 43 percent of respondents from mature markets said they used car dealer ( both new and used ) websites to research vehicles before buying one .

This statistic shows institutions perceived by public to be among the most affected by corruption around the world in 2013 . During the survey , 51 percent of respondents stated that political parties were the institution most affected by corruption .

This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans on when they throw away uneaten food . 56 percent of respondents said that they would not throw away uneaten food if it did not smell , look or taste bad .
The statistic shows the revenue of the ESPRIT brand worldwide from 2005 to 2020 . In 2020 , the ESPRIT brand generated a global revenue of approximately 1.27 billion U.S. dollars .

In 2020 , around 64.9 million hectares of fresh fruit were harvested worldwide . This was an increase from the previous year . The global area of fresh fruit harvested has been increasing over the past decades .
According to a survey conducted in March 2020 , 62 percent of respondents in the United States believed that hand soaps were very effective for preventing the spread of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) .
This statistic displays the number of transplants performed in the United States between January and March 2013 , by organ . During this period , 4,087 kidney transplants were performed in the U.S.

This statistic shows the opinion of Americans on whether Edward Snowden 's disclosures have harmed U.S. security . 49 percent of respondents said they think that Edward Snowden 's disclosures have harmed U.S. security to a great deal or somewhat .

This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans on whether they think reports of sexual assaults committed by military personnel represent individual acts of misconduct , or do they represent underlying problems with military culture . 55 percent of respondents stated that they think reports of sexual assaults committed by military personnel represent individual acts of misconduct .

This statistic shows the qualities of a good friend in the United States as of March 2013 . During the survey , 81 percent of respondents said that loyalty was one of the most important qualities they look for in close friends .
This statistic shows the results of a survey among adult Americans on what they do to improve their mood . 38 percent of respondents said that praying or meditating helps them improve their mood .

This statistic shows the revenue share of the Asia-Pacific telecom market in 2012 , by service type . In that year , mobile services accounted for 64 percent of the total revenue of the Asia-Pacific telecom market .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on activities expected to extend life expectancy in the United States as of 2013 . Some 58 percent of respondents said that more exercise was likely to extend their life expectancy .

This statistic shows the results of a survey among U.S. citizens on whether they think that the U.S. military will hold an absolute dominant position in the world in 20 years or that it will be just one of many powers . 57 percent of respondents stated that they think the U.S. military will be just one of many powers in the world in 20 years .

This statistic shows the worldwide number of deaths due to terrorism in 2011 , grouped by perpetrator category . In 2011 , there were 9,156 deaths caused by Islamic extremist ( Sunni ) terrorism worldwide .

This statistic shows the revenue of the mechanical engineering industry in Russia from 2006 to 2013 , with a projection until 2017 . In 2009 , the revenue of the Russian mechanical engineering industry amounted to approximately 16 billion euros .

According to a survey conducted in Russia in March 2020 , most respondents aged between 18 and 34 years believed that the coronavirus development would increase significantly . The share of people who thought that the coronavirus development would remain on the same level was highest among those aged between 25 and 34 years old .

This statistic illustrates the value contribution of European M & A activity in 2012 , by industry . The energy , mining and oil sector contributed with 31 percent to the total value of European M & A deals that year .

Health-related spam was the most prevalent category of spam content worldwide in 2019 , accounting for nearly 39 percent of all spam . Products and adult spam were the second and third most common categories of spam , accounting for 12 and 10 percent of spam , respectively .

This statistic shows the age at which smokers in the United States began smoking as of 2013 . The survey revealed that 40 percent of the respondents started smoking between the ages of 16 and 18 years old .

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Canada from 1986 to 2020 , with projections up until 2026 . GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year . In 2020 , the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic had a significant impact on the global travel industry . In March 2020 , the number of international tourists in China decreased by 85 percent compared to the same month in 2019 . The tourism industry was severely affected by the coronavirus crisis and many countries imposed travel restrictions or closed their borders .

This statistic shows the share of respondents who agree that international organisations are taking away too much power from the British government in a survey conducted between 2003 and 2013 . The share of respondents who agreed with this statement increased over time , from 52 percent in 2003 to 53 percent in 2013 .

This statistic shows the number of sport/tour motorcycle sales in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from January 2017 to December 2020 . The number of units sold fluctuated over this period , reaching its peak in March 2019 at 596 units sold . In December 2020 , 70 units were sold .

This statistic shows the sales value of steering equipment for motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2020 . In 2020 , the sales value of steering equipment amounted to approximately 140 million British pounds .

This statistic shows the number of non-scooter motorcycles and mopeds sold in the United Kingdom ( UK ) monthly from January 2017 to December 2020 . The UK experienced a peak in sales during March 2020 , when 13,845 units were sold . This was likely due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak , which led to many people taking up cycling as an alternative form of transport .

This statistic shows the volume of monthly sales of Yamaha motorcycles in the United Kingdom between January 2019 and June 2021 . The UK experienced a peak in motorcycle sales in June 2021 , with 1,863 units sold .

This statistic shows the number of cars sold at auction in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from September 2014 to January 2016 . The number of vehicles sold at auction fluctuated over this period , reaching a low of 55,738 units sold in December 2014 and a high of 123,390 units sold in March 2015 . In January 2016 , 110,460 cars were sold at auction in the United Kingdom .

This statistic shows the health care and immunization budget of India from fiscal year 2008 to fiscal year 2012 . In fiscal year 2012 , the Indian government spent around 25 billion U.S. dollars on health care .

This statistic displays the rate of cancer cases per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019 , by gender . The rate of cancer cases among females increased from 473.6 cases per 100,000 population in 1995 to 553.8 cases per 100,000 population in 2019 . The rate of cancer cases among males increased from 650.2 cases per 100,000 population in 1995 to 685.2 cases per 100,000 population in 2019 .
The statistic shows the number of suicide bombings worldwide from 2011 to 2013 . In 2013 , there were 276 suicide bombings worldwide .

This statistic displays the rate of stomach cancer cases per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019 , by gender . The rate of stomach cancer cases has decreased for both males and females over this time period . In 2019 , there were 14.8 cases of stomach cancer per 100,000 population among males and 6.7 cases per 100,000 population among females .

According to the 2020 survey , almost three quarters of children aged between three and six years old watched television daily or almost daily . Only one percent of respondents stated that their children never watched TV .

This statistic displays the rate of colon cancer cases per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019 , by gender . The rate of colon cancer cases among females increased over this period of time , reaching 42.1 cases per 100,000 population in 2019 .

This statistic displays the rate of newly diagnosed cases of testicular cancer per 100,000 population in England from 1995 to 2019 . The rate of newly diagnosed cases of testicular cancer increased over this period , reaching 7.2 cases per 100,000 population in 2019 .

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of combustion engine generators in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2018 . EU exports of such generators reached a value of 70 million British pounds in 2010 .

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of electrical engine ignition equipment in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2013 . The EU was clearly an important trade partner for the United Kingdom during this period . EU exports of electrical engine ignition equipment to the United Kingdom reached a value of 4.5 million British pounds in 2012 .

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of airbags with inflator system in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017 . The EU was clearly the main trading partner of the United Kingdom during this period . EU exports of airbags with inflator system reached a value of 54 million British pounds in 2016 .

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of suspension systems and parts for motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017 . EU exports of suspension systems and parts for motor vehicles reached a value of 41.6 million British pounds in 2017 .

This statistic shows the value from EU and non-EU exports of silencers and their parts for motor vehicles in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2017 . EU exports of silencers and their parts for motor vehicles were valued at approximately 26 million British pounds in 2015 .

This statistic shows the number of Peugeot 307 cars registered in Great Britain between 2001 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered cars grew from 24,569 in 2001 to 300,202 by 2008 . By 2018 , the cumulative total had grown to 122,944 cars .

This statistic shows the number of Citroen C3 cars registered in Great Britain between 2002 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered cars grew from 16,945 in 2002 to 242,737 by the end of 2018 .

This statistic shows the number of Toyota Avensis cars registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered cars grew from 64,593 in 2000 to a peak of 213,744 in 2010 .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic has had a significant impact on personal finances in Germany , the United Kingdom and the United States . In March 2020 , 6.2 percent of respondents in the U.S. stated that they were worried about their financial situation because of the coronavirus outbreak . This statistic shows the share of adults who were worried about their financial situation due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak in selected countries as of March 31 , 2020 .

This statistic shows the number of Nissan Almera cars registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered cars grew from 94,356 in 2000 to 217,900 by 2006 , before declining again . In 2018 there were 51,027 Nissan Almera cars registered in Great Britain .

This statistic shows the volume of EU and non-EU exports of motor vehicle silencers in the United Kingdom between 2010 and 2013 . The EU was clearly the most important market for UK exports of motor vehicle silencers , accounting for over 95 percent of total EU and non-EU exports .

This statistic shows the percentage of U.S. population who knows someone who has been sexually harassed at work in 2014 . In 2014 , about 18 percent of respondents said they knew someone who had been sexually harassed at work .

This statistic shows the number of Triumph Street Triple motorcycles registered in Great Britain between 2007 and 2018 . The figures show an increasing trend until 2016 , when the number of registered bikes peaked at 9,543 . In 2018 , there were approximately 8,800 registered bikes .

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Sprinter registered light goods vehicles ( LGVs ) in Great Britain between 2000 and 2019 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered Sprinter LGVs reached its peak at 208,746 by the end of 2019 .

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Vito light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered vehicles grew from 17,649 in 2000 to 77,533 by 2018 .

This statistic shows the number of Fiat Doblo light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2001 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered vehicles grew from 1,694 units in 2001 to 40,753 units by the end of 2018 .

This statistic shows the number of Toyota HiAce light goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered vehicles grew from 36,459 in 2000 to a peak of 38,971 in 2008 , before declining again . In 2018 there were 19,949 Toyota HiAce LGVs registered .

This statistic shows the research and development expenditure of the tesa Group worldwide in 2012 and 2013 . In 2013 , the tesa Group invested approximately 41.7 million euros in research and development .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic had a significant impact on the tourism industry in 2020 . The number of bed nights in leading European city tourism destinations decreased by over 75 percent compared to the previous year . The largest decrease was recorded for Rome , where the number of bed nights dropped by 80 percent .
This statistic shows the impacts of feeling sleepy in the United States as of May 2019 . During the survey , 65 percent of respondents stated that feeling sleepy had an impact on their mood .

The music publishing revenue of Universal Music Group increased significantly over the past years . In 2020 , the company generated around 1.37 billion euros with its music publishing business . This was an increase of roughly 450 million euros compared to the previous year .

This statistic shows the number of Leyland DAF FA 45 heavy goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of Leyland DAF FA 45 HGVs registered decreased from 27,136 in 2000 to 3,396 by the end of 2018 .

This statistic shows the number of Mercedes Sprinter heavy goods vehicles registered in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered vehicles grew from 9,765 in 2000 to 5,243 by the end of 2018 .

This statistic shows the number of Isuzu Trucks NQR registered heavy goods vehicles ( HGVs ) in Great Britain between 2000 and 2018 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . The number of registered trucks peaked at 5,046 in 2008 . By the end of 2018 , there were 1,537 Isuzu Trucks NQR registered HGVs in Great Britain .

This statistic shows the annual income from the output of forage plants in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2000 to 2020 . The figures represent mid-year estimates and include crops such as grasses , cereals , legumes and root crops . In 2020 , the value of the output of forage plants amounted to approximately 217 million British pounds .

This statistic shows the producer price index of total outputs in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 1994 to 2019 . The index measures the average change over time in prices received by producers for their output , i.e. it indicates whether producer prices have increased or decreased over time in relation to a standard year , in this case 2015 . In 2019 , the total output price index was 113.6 .
This statistic shows the average summer travel spend per person in the United States from 2011 to 2016 . The average summer travel spend per person amounted to 943 U.S. dollars in 2016 .

This statistic shows the retail sales of chewing gum in Canada from 2010 to 2018 . Retail sales of chewing gum amounted to approximately 400 million U.S. dollars in 2018 , unchanged from the previous year .

This statistic shows the average annual mileage of petrol and diesel cars in England in 2015 , by purpose . Petrol cars used for commuting had an average annual mileage of 2,268 miles , while diesel cars used for business had an average annual mileage of 1,304 miles .
This statistic shows the sales growth of leading 20 ethnic hair care brands in the United States in 2014 . In that year , the brand SoftSheen Carson had a sales growth of 13.7 percent .

In April 2020 , the share of cancellations in Brazil reached its highest value for that year . In this month , 18 percent of all bookings were canceled . The share of cancellations decreased significantly over the following months . By December 2020 , only one percent of all bookings were canceled .

This statistic presents the number of international sea passenger movements at the port of London in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2003 and 2017 . The number of international sea passenger movements fluctuated over this period . In 2017 , there were approximately 11 million international sea passenger movements at the port of London .

This statistic presents the number of international sea passenger movements at the port of Plymouth in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2003 and 2017 . The number of international sea passenger movements at this port decreased over this period of time , reaching approximately 425 thousand in 2017 .

This statistic shows the share of journalists who were very satisfied with their jobs in the United States from 1971 to 2013 . In 2013 , 23 percent of journalists said they were very satisfied with their jobs .

This statistic presents the number of international sea passenger movements at the port of Hull in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2003 and 2020 . The number of international sea passenger movements at this port decreased over this period of time , reaching approximately 229 thousand in 2020 .
This statistic shows the average price per route of low cost airlines in Europe in 2013 and 2014 . In 2014 , Ryanair had an average price of 67 euros per route .

This statistic shows the results of a survey asking respondents to what extent they agree or disagree with certain statements regarding career progression in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014 . Of respondents , 63 percent agreed that practical experience is worth more than academic qualifications when it comes to getting promoted .

This statistic presents information on mobile payment experiences in the United States as of July 2015 . During the survey period , 34 percent of respondents stated that they had used their smartphone to pay for a product or service at a store or other merchant .

The pharmaceutical industry is an important part of the European economy . In 2020 , there were around 851,000 people employed in the pharmaceutical industry across the European Federation of Pharmaceutical Industries and Associations ( EFPIA ) member countries . This was an increase from the previous year .

This statistic shows the share of U.S. citizens who take a summer vacation as of August 2014 , by gender . During the survey , 68 percent of female respondents stated that they took a summer vacation in the past year .

This statistic shows the average travel spend per night in the United States from 2012 to 2016 , by travel agency use . In 2013 , travelers who used an agent to book any portion of their trip spent an average of 445 U.S. dollars per night on their trip .

According to a survey conducted in France in April 2020 , nearly half of respondents believed that French people respected badly or very badly the containment rules set up by the country 's authorities . Only three percent of respondents thought that the French respected these rules very well .

This statistic shows the most annoying factors for air travelers in the United States as of July 2014 . During the survey , 68 percent of respondents said that canceled or delayed flights annoyed them when traveling by air .
This statistic shows the most important import partners for Denmark in 2019 . In 2019 , the most important import partner for Denmark was Germany with a share of 21 percent in all imports .

This statistic shows the travel planning methods of Generation X in the United States as of July 2016 . During the survey , 34 percent of respondents said they planned their trips using destination management organization ( DMO ) websites .

This statistic shows the results of a survey asking whether respondents in the United Kingdom ( UK ) thought their household would purchase 4K resolution television in the future . Of respondents , 26 percent said they did not think their household would ever purchase a 4K television .

This statistic shows the impact of regulation on creating new bank products , delivery channels and expansion to new markets in the United States in 2013 . During the survey , 43 percent of respondents stated that there would be no change in their banking activity as a result of regulation .

This statistic shows the number of new small rigid heavy goods vehicles registered in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between January 2014 and July 2016 . The peak value in this period was reached in March 2014 with 1,153 units registered .

This statistic shows the percentage of employees worldwide who were satisfied with their allotted paid vacation time as of August 2014 , by country . During the survey , 83 percent of respondents from Germany said they were satisfied with their allotted paid vacation time .

This statistic shows the number of large rigid HGVs registered in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2013 to 2015 , by month . The number of new registrations peaked in December 2014 with 1,986 units sold .

This statistic shows the monthly number of new registrations of cars , vans and HGVs in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between January 2013 and December 2015 . The figures represent a running cumulative total . In December 2015 there were 4,689 new articulated HGVs registered .
In 2020 , Home Depot had approximately 1,763 million customer transactions worldwide . Lowe 's had around 1.05 billion customer transactions in the same year .

The statistic shows the gold medal times in the 400m hurdles at the Summer Olympics from 1900 to 2020 . The women 's 400m hurdles was first included as an event at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles . The men 's 400m hurdles was introduced at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich .

As of November 2019 , 84 percent of U.S. adults who identified as Democrats had a favorable view of climate activists . In comparison , only 24 percent of Republicans held a positive opinion of climate activists .

This statistic shows the most common payment method used when purchasing for back-to-college in the United States as of August 2017 . During the survey , 46 percent of respondents said they planned to use debit card or check card most often when purchasing for back-to-college .
This statistic shows the percentage of Americans who were married between age 18-32 as of 2014 , by generation . In 2013 , 56 percent of Millennials were married between age 18 and 32 .
This statistic shows the number of persons arrested for fraud offences in England and Wales from 2015/16 to 2020/21 . In 2020/21 , there were approximately 5,834 arrests made for fraud offences .

This statistic shows the number of persons arrested for criminal damage and arson offences in England and Wales from 2015/16 to 2020/21 . In 2020/21 , there were approximately 47,389 arrests made for criminal damage and arson offences .
This statistic shows the frequency of use of banking channels in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2011 to 2015 . In 2015 , 74 percent of respondents used internet banking at least once a week .

This statistic shows the share of adults in the U.S. who believe that it is the government 's responsibility to provide health insurance , by generation . In 2014 , 68 percent of non-white Millennials believed that it was the government 's responsibility to provide health insurance .

This statistic shows the percentage of internet users and non-users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012 , by socio-economic group . In this year , 37 percent of respondents from socio-economic group E were non/rare internet users .

This statistic shows the share of parents in the United States who expect to purchase electronics for their children during back-to-school shopping in 2015 and 2016 , by item . In 2016 , 28 percent of respondents expected to buy laptops for their children .

As of January 2021 , Twitter users in Argentina were more likely to be male than female . According to data , 61 percent of Twitter users in the South American country were men and 39 percent were women . In general , social networks have a higher penetration among men than women in Latin America .

This statistic shows the level of trust shown by the British public in small businesses in June 2014 . During the survey , 30 percent of respondents said they had a medium level of trust in small businesses .

According to a survey from April 2020 , over one third of Polish companies stated that they could wait for one month without firing employees due to the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) outbreak . Another 26 percent of respondents said that they could wait two months before dismissing their staff .

This statistic shows the level of trust shown by the British public in multinational firms in June 2014 . During the survey , 38 percent of respondents said they had a medium level of trust in multinational firms .
This statistic shows the level of trust shown by the British public in creative companies in June 2014 . Of respondents , 35 percent said they had a strong level of trust in creative companies .

This statistic shows the level of trust shown by the British public in construction companies in June 2014 . The majority of respondents , 73 percent , had either a medium or strong level of trust in construction companies .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on whether technology improves human contact in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of 2012 , by age and gender . The survey revealed that 43 percent of respondents aged between 25 and 34 years somewhat agreed with the statement that technology improves human contact .
This statistic shows the level of trust shown by the British public in law firms in June 2014 . The majority of respondents ( 60 percent ) had either a poor or very poor level of trust in law firms .
This statistic shows the media types consumed on weekends in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012 . In 2012 , 49 percent of respondents reported watching TV 'live ' from a channel or terrestrial TV .

This statistic shows the media types consumed first thing in the morning in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012 . In 2012 , 26 percent of respondents said they listened to the radio first thing in the morning .
This statistic shows the reasons for fathers to stay at home in the United States from 1989 and 2012 . In 2012 , 35 percent of fathers stayed at home because they were ill or disabled .

This statistic shows the total population of Taiwan from 1990 to 2018 , with projections up until 2030 . In 2018 , the total population of Taiwan was estimated at approximately 23.6 million inhabitants .

This statistic presents the most popular social media sites in Arab countries as of November 2014 , by reach . During the survey period , it was found that 88 percent of respondents accessed Facebook .

On March 11 , 2020 , Pornhub 's hourly traffic in Italy increased by up to 47 percent compared to the same day in 2019 . The highest increase was recorded between midnight and 1 a.m. , when the website received 40.8 percent more traffic than on March 11 , 2019 .

This statistic shows the results of a survey asking UK adults to what extent they agree or disagree with the statement : `` Businesses do not take effective action to regain trust after it has been damaged '' . In June 2014 , 60 percent of respondents agreed that businesses do not take effective action to regain trust after it has been damaged .

This statistic shows the breakdown of U.S. Highway Trust Fund revenue in fiscal year 2018 , by segment . In that year , about 63.4 percent of the total revenue of the U.S. Highway Trust Fund was generated through gasoline taxes .

This statistic shows the number of VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2021 . In 2021 , there were approximately 2.78 million VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the United Kingdom .

This statistic shows the leading investments made by homeowners in prepping their homes to sell in the United States as of 2013 and 2014 . During the survey , 40 percent of respondents said they made small repairs to the inside and outside of their home .

This statistic shows the number of local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in London from 2014 to 2021 . In 2021 , there were approximately 593 thousand local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in London .

In 2019 , there were around 130,000 micro enterprises in the crop and animal production industry in the United Kingdom . This was a slight increase from the previous year when there were approximately 128,000 micro enterprises in this sector . The number of enterprises with between five and nine employees also increased by 456 units to 11,275 .

In 2019 , there were 734 local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the mining of metal ores industry employing less than 5 employees in the United Kingdom . Additionally , there were no enterprises with a turnover of more than 5 million British pounds and number of employees between 250 and 299 in this sector .

In 2019 , there were 2,843 local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the manufacture of wearing apparel sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) . The majority of these were small enterprises employing less than 20 people .

This statistic shows the number of VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the wood manufacturing sector in the United Kingdom for 2019 , by employment size band . In this year there were 7,584 micro enterprises operating in this sector .

In 2019 , grocery was the vertical with the highest number of pages seen at buying sessions worldwide . Apparel and energy were the second and third verticals with the most pages seen at buying sessions in 2019 .

The statistic shows the growth in real GDP in Indonesia from 2016 to 2020 , with projections up until 2026 . In 2020 , Indonesia 's real gross domestic product decreased by around 1.83 percent compared to the previous year .

This statistic shows the number of VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the furniture manufacturing sector in the United Kingdom for 2019 , by employment size band . In this year there were 4,053 small enterprises in the furniture manufacturing sector in the United Kingdom , meaning that they had fewer than 250 employees .

This statistic shows the number of local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the wholesale and retail trade ; repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2019 , by employment size band . In this year there were 60,543 small enterprises in this sector employing less than 20 people .

In 2019 , there were 1,065 local units in VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the air transport industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) . The majority of these were small enterprises employing less than 20 people .

The statistic shows the national debt of Indonesia from 2016 to 2019 in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) , with projections up until 2026 . The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state , the communities , the municipalities and the social insurances . In 2019 , the national debt of Indonesia amounted to approximately 31.14 percent of the GDP .

In 2020 , there were over 25 thousand VAT/PAYE based enterprises in the sports activities and recreation industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) with less than five employees . This was followed by over six thousand enterprises employing between five and nine people .
The statistic shows the total number of vehicles of the United States Postal Service from FY 2004 to FY 2021 . In FY 2021 , the U.S. Postal Service had approximately 235,687 vehicles in operation .

This statistic shows the number of VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the coke manufacturing industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2013 to 2019 , by turnover size band . This statistic shows the average income rating in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2018 , by region . In 2018 , the average income rating for Greater London was 6.13 .

In 2021 , there were over 20.7 thousand VAT/PAYE based enterprises in the civil engineering sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) . These enterprises employed between one and four people .

This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the programming and broadcasting activities sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2019 , by employment size band . In 2019 there were 168 micro enterprises operating in the programming and broadcasting activities sector in the United Kingdom employing less than 4 people .

This statistic shows the number of VAT/PAYE enterprises in the security and investigation activities sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2021 , by region . In this year there were 2,463 VAT/PAYE enterprises in the security and investigation activities sector in London .

This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the education sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2019 , by employment size band . In this year there were 26,584 micro enterprises operating within the education sector in the UK , this is enterprises with less than four employees .

This statistic shows the share of restaurant employees who would like to own a restaurant in the United States as of October 2013 , by age group . During the survey , 63 percent of respondents aged between 18 and 24 years stated that they would like to own a restaurant one day .
In 2021 , around 35 percent of home owners in England were aged 65 years and over . This statistic illustrates the distribution of home owners in England in 2021 , by age group .

This statistic shows the distribution of mail segments in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2005 to 2012 . In this period , parcels share of the total mail volume increased from five percent to 11 percent .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on car dealers ' satisfaction with the cost and quality of used car warranties in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in January 2016 . Kia dealers were most satisfied with their manufacturer 's used car warranties , with an average score of 8.7 out of 10 . Jaguar dealers were least satisfied with their manufacturer 's used car warranties , with an average score of 3.1 out of 10 .

This statistic shows the best-rated midsize-ship cruise lines by travelers in the United States as of May 2021 . According to the survey , Viking Ocean Cruises was the top-rated midsize-ship cruise line with an average score of 95.4 out of 100 .

According to a survey from March 2020 , 58 percent of respondents in the United Kingdom ( UK ) would consider using digital health services instead of visiting their doctor in person due to coronavirus . Only four percent of respondents stated that they already use such services .

This statistic shows the advantages of buying art online according to international buyers as of April 2015 . During the survey period , 80 percent of respondents stated that they liked the fact that they could search for art online .

According to a survey conducted in May 2021 , Disney Cruise Line was the best-rated cruise line among travelers in the United States . The average score for Disney Cruise Line was 94 out of 100 . Celebrity Cruises and Cunard Line followed with an average score of 89 and 88 respectively .

This statistic shows the results of a survey on car dealers ' satisfaction with the professionalism of their manufacturer in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in January 2016 . The average satisfaction was 6.7 out of 10 . The highest satisfaction was for Mercedes-Benz at 9.6 out of 10 , while Jaguar had the lowest satisfaction at 4.8 out of 10 .
This statistic shows the friendliest cities in the United States as of August 2014 . Charleston , South Carolina was ranked first with an index score of 84.3 .
This statistic shows the distribution of Academy Award winners by age in 2014 . In that year , 37 percent of actresses who won an Academy Award were under 25 years old .

This statistic shows the reasons for using the internet to interact with public authorities or services in Great Britain in 2020 . During the survey period , 45 percent of respondents stated that they used the internet to obtain information from websites .

This statistic shows the reasons for online file sharing and saving in Great Britain as of 2014 , by age . During the survey period it was found that 65 percent of respondents aged between 25 and 34 years stated that they used online file sharing services to protect their data from loss or damage .

This statistic shows the percentage of internet users who regularly visit public services or local authority websites ( Government , health , council information etc . ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012 , by age . In 2020 , 38 percent of respondents aged between 18 and 24 years old believed that the winners or losers should be decided by the number of medals won . This statistic shows the share of people who believe that the winners or losers should be decided by the number of medals won in major sports events affected by COVID-19 in 2020 , by age group .

This statistic presents information on the online activities of new internet users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) as of January 2015 . During the reported period , 69 percent of respondents stated that they used the internet to search for goods or services .
This statistic shows the number of new bus and coach registrations in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2020 , by bus manufacturer . In 2020 there were 481 Ford buses registered in the UK .
This statistic shows the forecast for the number of new hotel rooms opening in Europe from 2012 to 2016 . It is expected that in 2014 , there will be 39,000 new hotel rooms opening in Europe .

This statistic shows the leading light goods vehicle models in Great Britain as of 2019 . The Ford Transit was the most common LGV model registered with over 965 thousand vehicles on the road .

This statistic shows the annual change in average daily sun hours in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2001 to 2020 . The average daily sun hours in 2020 was 2.04 hours , an increase of 0.2 hours compared to the ten-year mean .
This statistic shows the average daily temperature in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2001 to 2021 . The average daily temperature in the United Kingdom in 2021 was 10.38 degrees Celsius .
This statistic shows the statutory minimum wage in the United States from 1938 to November 2013 . In November 2013 , the minimum wage was set at 7.25 U.S. dollars per hour .
This statistic shows the monthly average daily temperature in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2015 to 2021 . The average daily temperature in the UK in January 2021 was 4.8 degrees Celsius .
The statistic shows the population of Europe from 1950 to 2021 . In 2021 , the estimated population of Europe amounted to approximately 746.8 million inhabitants .

This statistic shows the quarterly average number of heating degree days in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2011 to 2019 . A heating degree day is a measure of how much heating is required for a building , calculated by multiplying the daily average temperature below 16 degrees Celsius by the number of days . In 2019 , there were 9.2 heating degree days in the first quarter .

This statistic shows the quarterly average wind speed in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010 to 2021 . The average wind speed in the United Kingdom has increased over this period of time , with the highest average wind speed recorded in Q1 2020 at 11.4 miles per hour .

This statistic shows retail spending growth in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 on 2012 , by food and non-food sectors . In 2013 , total retail spending increased by 1.5 percent compared to the previous year .

The statistic shows the number of Facebook fans/Twitter followers of the NBA franchise Memphis Grizzlies from September 2012 to September 2021 . In September 2021 , the Facebook page of the Memphis Grizzlies basketball team had around 1.81 million fans .

This statistic shows the general attractiveness factors of the United Kingdom ( UK ) for tourists in 2014 .
