In 2020 , around 15 percent of respondents in Romania would like to work four days per week from home and one day at the office . Another 12 percent of respondents would prefer five days working from home and zero days at the office .

This statistic presents the opinion of French parents on their daughter having so-called `` boy '' toys in 2019 . It reveals that 70 percent of respondents stated that their daughter already has `` boy '' toys , and 60 percent said they intend to buy her `` boy '' toys .

This statistic shows the prevalence of mental distress among U.S. adults with a disability in 2018 , by gender . In that year , around 37 percent of female U.S. adults with a disability reported having experienced mental distress within the past 30 days .

According to a survey conducted in August 2020 , around 37 percent of U.S. physicians were upset with the lack of adequate personal protective equipment ( PPE ) during the COVID-19 pandemic . In addition , 58 percent of respondents were upset with the lack of support from the Paycheck Protection Program ( PPP ) .

In June 2021 , around half of U.S. physicians experienced a reduction in income due to COVID-19 . In the same month , 32 percent of physicians were shifted to a primarily telemedicine-based practice .

As of May 2021 , around 67 percent of Brazilians stated that they planned to get vaccinated against COVID-19 . Meanwhile , eight percent of respondents said they did not want to be vaccinated against the virus .

As of January 20 , 2022 , there were over 450 thousand confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Kyiv , the capital of Ukraine . The second most affected region was Odessa Oblast with more than 320 thousand cases .

Peru 's trade value in 2020 was measured at 36 billion U.S. dollars , of which exports amounted to 39 billion U.S. dollars . This means that Peru had a trade surplus of three billion U.S. dollars in 2020 .

According to a survey conducted in Poland in April 2020 , most respondents believed that the government 's actions had a chance to limit the growth of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic . Only seven percent of respondents stated that they did not know if the government 's actions could have an impact on the spread of the virus .

In 2020 , around 283 thousand marriages were registered in Algeria . This was a decrease of over 15 thousand marriages compared to the previous year . The number of marriages has been decreasing since 2014 .

As of March 1-4 , 2021 , 67 percent of Canadians said they would get vaccinated for COVID-19 as soon as one became available to them . This statistic shows the share of Canadians who would get vaccinated for COVID-19 from July 23 , 2020 to March 4 , 2021 .

As of October 2020 , 89 percent of individuals in Great Britain believed that encouraging people to stay at home would be effective in reducing the spread of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) . This statistic shows the share of individuals who believe certain measures would or would not be effective in reducing the spread of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in Great Britain as of October 2020 .

In 2019 , exports of agriculture , hunting , and fishery products from Algeria amounted to approximately 11.9 billion Algerian dinars . This was an increase from the previous year , when exports were valued at around 11 billion Algerian dinars .

This statistic shows the leading agricultural products in Algeria based on production value in 2018 . In that year , the production value of dates amounted to approximately 3.7 billion U.S. dollars , making it the leading agricultural product in the country .

As of March 2020 , over half of Hungarians followed coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) related news more than other types of news . Only six percent of respondents stated that they did not follow any news at all .

This statistic displays the share of population with insufficient physical activity in selected countries in Latin America between 2001 and 2016 . During this period , 48 percent of the Brazilian population had an insufficient level of physical activity .

In 2019 , there were 32 deaths in the shipbuilding industry in South Korea among workers with less than six months of experience . In that same year , there were no deaths reported among workers with more than five years of experience .

As of March 2020 , 35 percent of Romanian nationals who tested positive for coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) had travelled to Italy before the outbreak . The second most common travel destination was the United Kingdom with three percent of infected Romanians having visited there .

The coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic is expected to have a significant impact on the Romanian economy in 2020 . The single-hit scenario , which assumes that the country will not experience a second wave of infections , predicts a contraction of 5.6 percent in real GDP . In case of a double-hit scenario , the economy could shrink by as much as 8.7 percent .

The statistic shows the number of direct jobs created by the app economy in the European Union from January 2016 to July 2019 . In July 2019 , the app economy created approximately 673 thousand jobs in the EU .

In April 2021 , the consumer price index ( CPI ) for vegetables , tubers , plantains , and root crops in Ghana was measured at 137.6 points . This was the highest value among all food and non-alcoholic beverage groups . The lowest CPI was recorded for fruit juice and vegetable juice , which stood at 102.4 points .
The statistic shows the unemployment rate in Algeria from 2010 to 2019 , by gender . In 2019 , the unemployment rate among women in Algeria was at approximately 20.7 percent .

According to a survey from 2020 , close family members were the most popular recipients of Christmas presents in Hungary . More than 95 percent of Hungarians bought gifts for their close family members . In contrast , only eight percent of respondents bought Christmas presents for colleagues .

According to a survey conducted in March 2020 , 31 percent of U.S. adults agreed that e-cigarettes are less harmful than traditional cigarettes . In contrast , 58 percent of respondents strongly disagreed with this statement .

This statistic shows the confidence level of businesses in their ability to understand cyber threats worldwide as of July 2019 , by industry . During the survey period it was found that 59 percent of manufacturing industry professionals were fairly confident in their business 's ability to understand cyber threats .

In 2020 , most requests to delist website content from Google in Denmark were related to insufficient information . This was followed by requests regarding name not found and professional information .

In 2019 , France exported around 1.75 million kilograms of used textile articles and rags . This was a decrease compared to the previous year . The total value of French exports of used textile articles and rags amounted to approximately 34.6 million euros in 2019 .

The statistic shows the number of clinical trial starts for novel heart failure drugs in the United States from 2009 to 2018 , by stage . In 2018 , there were four clinical trial starts for novel heart failure drugs at the phase I stage in the U.S.

The COVID-19 pandemic has caused a significant increase in sales of hygiene and household products in Argentina . In the week from March 2 to March 8 , antiseptics sales increased by 370 percent compared to the previous week . Sales of household insecticides and toilet soaps also grew by 260 and 84 percent respectively .

In 2021 , there were approximately 31.4 million registered mobile money customers in Uganda . This was an increase from around 27.5 million registered customers in the previous year . Mobile money is a form of electronic money that can be used to make payments and transfer funds via mobile phone .

The Queen 's Gambit is an American television drama series based on the 2013 novel of the same name by Walter Tevis . The series premiered in the United States on October 18 , 2020 . In Mexico , the show was titled Gambito de Dama and was released on Netflix on November 15 , 2020 . The chart shows the number of searches for the show in Mexico from October 18 to November 28 , 2020 .
Angola 's proved natural gas reserves decreased by 100 billion cubic meters between 2016 and 2020 . In 2020 , the country had around 301 billion cubic meters of proved natural gas reserves .

In 2020 , Angola 's natural gas demand reached approximately 821 million cubic meters . This was an increase from the previous year , when the country consumed around 790 million cubic meters of natural gas .

In the academic year 2019/2020 , more than 33 thousand foreign students from the European Union were enrolled in higher education degrees in Spain . The second largest group of foreign students was from Latin America and Caribbean , with over 17 thousand students .
Shin-Etsu Chemical Co. Ltd. is one of the largest chemical companies in Japan . The company 's total number of employees increased from 17.6 thousand in 2012 to 24.1 thousand in 2020 .

In 2020 , instant messaging was the most common internet activity among young people in Norway . More than 98 percent of respondents stated that they used instant messaging services such as WhatsApp or Facebook Messenger to communicate with friends and family . The second most popular online activity was participating in social networks , followed by watching video content from sharing services .
This statistic shows the foreign population in selected European countries in 1960 , 1976 and 1990 . In 1990 , there were approximately 5,248 thousand foreigners living in Germany .

According to a survey conducted in June 2020 , PC gamers in the United States spent more time playing fighting games during the COVID-19 pandemic than any other genre . The average PC gamer reported spending an additional 23 percent of their time playing fighting games compared to before the pandemic .

In March 2020 , nearly half of Polish cosmetics companies reported that the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic had a negative impact on their exports . Only 13 percent of respondents stated that they developed their exports and/or entered new markets during the pandemic .

As of January 2022 , Lääne maakond had the highest number of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases for every 100 thousand people in Estonia . The number was followed by Harju and Tartu maakond with 4,203 and 3,850 cases per 100 thousand people , respectively .
In 2020 , private consumption accounted for around 68.4 percent of Vietnam 's total GDP . This was an increase from the previous year .
According to a survey conducted in Russia in April 2020 , most respondents supported mandatory wearing of masks in public places and maintaining a distance of 1.5-2 meters between people .

In 2020 , the average retail price of wheat flour in Russia amounted to 38.75 Russian rubles per kilogram . This was an increase from the previous year when the price stood at 36.41 Russian rubles per kilogram .

In September 2020 , 47 percent of Russians agreed with the statement that they would like to return to pre-perestroika times . The share of respondents who disagreed with this statement was 39 percent .

This statistic shows the percentage of adults aged 65 years and older who had received influenza vaccinations in the United States from 2009 to 2018 , by race . In 2018 , around 59 percent of black adults aged 65 years and older were reported to have received an influenza vaccination .

According to a survey conducted in September 2020 , 36 percent of caregivers in the United States reported that their responsibilities increased due to COVID-19 . In comparison , 54 percent of caregivers stated that their responsibilities stayed about the same as before the pandemic .

According to a survey conducted in December 2019 , 45 percent of U.S. adults stated that they cyber stalked their ex or current partner online because they did not trust them . Another 38 percent of respondents said that they did it out of curiosity .

During Black Friday 2019 , the category of consoles was the most clicked product category in the Netherlands . The number of clicks on consoles increased by 1,540 percent compared to an average Friday . Headphones and wireless speakers were also popular categories during Black Friday .

In 2020 , the French were more advanced in Christmas gift shopping and preparation than last year . This was mainly due to the fact that they made their purchases before the delivery times and before the end of September .
This statistic shows the forecasted electricity generation in France in 2050 , by energy source . It is estimated that nuclear power will generate 184,000 terawatt hours of electricity in 2050 .
